objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZYXEL-STP-MIB::zyStpRootGuardDetect ZYXEL-STP-MIB::zyStpMode i 1 ZYXEL-MSTP-MIB::zyMstpInstanceId i 9999 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999

description: Activate one of the spanning tree protocol modes on the Switch.
variables.name: ZYXEL-STP-MIB::zyStpMode

description: An integer with values ranging from 0 to (zyMstpVlanMapMaxNumberOfInstances -1)
that identify a CIST/MSTI instance. The value 0 represents CIST, whereas
zyMstpVlanMapMaxNumberOfInstances represents the maximum number of MSTP instances.
variables.name: ZYXEL-MSTP-MIB::zyMstpInstanceId

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZYXEL-STP-MIB::zyStpRootGuardRecovered ZYXEL-STP-MIB::zyStpMode i 1 ZYXEL-MSTP-MIB::zyMstpInstanceId i 9999 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999

description: Activate one of the spanning tree protocol modes on the Switch.
variables.name: ZYXEL-STP-MIB::zyStpMode

description: An integer with values ranging from 0 to (zyMstpVlanMapMaxNumberOfInstances -1)
that identify a CIST/MSTI instance. The value 0 represents CIST, whereas
zyMstpVlanMapMaxNumberOfInstances represents the maximum number of MSTP instances.
variables.name: ZYXEL-MSTP-MIB::zyMstpInstanceId

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex
